# NSWindow.AnimationBehavior.default

**Case**

The automatic animation that’s appropriate to the window type. This is the default.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Constants

- **NSWindow.AnimationBehavior.none**: No automatic animation used. This may be useful when you perform your own window animation.
- **NSWindow.AnimationBehavior.documentWindow**: The animation behavior that’s appropriate to the document window style.
- **NSWindow.AnimationBehavior.utilityWindow**: The animation behavior that’s appropriate to the utility window style.
- **NSWindow.AnimationBehavior.alertPanel**: The animation behavior that’s appropriate to the alert window style.
